title: Vail Resorts signals $100M cost efficiencies by FY2026 amid visitation growth
excerpt: Discover Vail Resorts' Q2 2025 earnings insights: robust EBITDA growth, $100M cost-saving targets, and stable fiscal guidance.
text: Earnings Call Insights: Vail Resorts (MTN) Q2 2025 Management View CEO Kirsten Lynch highlighted an 8% growth in resort reported EBITDA compared to the prior year, supported by the Season Pass Program and improved conditions at North American resorts.
